docs.text: no , it is not a bad film , in fact it is so good in achieving its purpose , i actually wished for the film to end itself quickly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: event horizon is not your run-of-the-mill sci-fi film , i'm sure many who have watched this will agree with me .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is not even original in that sense , and it does borrow heavily from films like alien , hellraiser and even blade runner .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the magic of this film lies in its unorthodox setting and methodical build-up that makes it wonderfully horrifying .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story brings us to the year 2050 , where space travel have since enormously progressed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the event horizon is actually a ship built for a secret experimental purpose ; it has the ability to fold time and space thus making it possible for travelling distances not reachable in a man's lifetime .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ship disappeared as soon as it went into operation but after 7 years , it reappeared again within the orbit of neptune .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a search and rescue team led by miller ( fishburne ) is given the task to check for survivors of the event horizon .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the designer of the ship , dr . weir ( neill ) follows along to satisfy his curiosity on what actually happened to his otherwise technologically impressive ship .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: event horizon is a sci-fi horror film , much truer to the word than say , alien would ever be .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while in alien , the crew has to cope with a ferocious creature while encased within tight spaces , in event horizon , the forces which goes against the crew is undefined but yet so powerful and horrifying .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story unfolds itself slowly and the suspense buildup is superb , up till the point where i really felt like saying out loud `enough !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i can't stand this anymore ! ' .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there are more than enough jolts to send your adrenalin pumping overtime .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story in itself is not exactly something very exciting and also , the acting is only at most , average by most commercial standards .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even so , the essence of horror is carried out very well in this film , thanks to its well-paced storytelling , disturbing set designs and some really gory sequences ( which incidentally , has been quite generously removed by our censorship board ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: director paul anderson ( who did mortal kombat ) and his team of `atmosphere' creators have done well in keeping event horizon within the bounds of the term `horror' .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this picture did not do very well in the us box-office most probably for the dread-factor impact it has on most audiences ; people will not see it again and not many would recommend their friend to watch this .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although on the face of it , event horizon is mostly molded for mass-entertainment ; many thrills , spills and suspense to keep audiences in focus .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , the offbeat horror element which it ultimately convey audiences is very disturbing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: my friend and i could not say a word to each other for quite a while after going through the `experience' of event horizon .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i guess it was just the immense feeling of dread which the film had cast upon us .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: be forewarned , this film is not for the faint-hearted nor for pure entertainment .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: be prepared to be disturbed if you should decide to watch this film !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: event horizon is highly recommended ? ? but at your own risk !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it has been a long time since good-horror embraced the big screen , and event horizon is one .
docs.label: positive
